edu.snu.rixk.controller

Class SetupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.rixk.controller.SetupController

  • public class SetupController
extends java.lang.Object
    SetupController This controller handles events that happen during the setup phase of Rixk.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Tim Solum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SetupController(GameState model, SetupView view)
      Builds this SetupController object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPlayerEvent(java.lang.String filename)
      Adds an AI Player to the game state.
      void assignPlayerTerritoriesEvent()
      Randomly assigns Territories to Players (using up one of their armies to place) until all territories are owned.
      void placeArmyEvent(Player player)
      This event signals a Player to place one army if the Player has at least 1 army to place.
      boolean selectMapEvent(java.lang.String filename)
      Modifies the current RixkMap being played on in the game state.
      void startGetArmiesEvent(GetArmiesView getArmiesView)
      This event signals the GameViewManager that the SetupView will be done soon and it queues up the GetArmiesView that should follow.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SetupController

        public SetupController(GameState model,
                       SetupView view)
        Builds this SetupController object.
        Parameters:
        model - The GameState object for the game
        view - The SetupView this Controller operates on

    • Method Detail

      • selectMapEvent

        public boolean selectMapEvent(java.lang.String filename)
        Modifies the current RixkMap being played on in the game state.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename for the desired RixkMap
        Returns:
        Whether or not the RixkMap was successfully selected

      • addPlayerEvent

        public boolean addPlayerEvent(java.lang.String filename)
        Adds an AI Player to the game state.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the AI module
        Returns:
        Whether the Player was successfully added

      • assignPlayerTerritoriesEvent

        public void assignPlayerTerritoriesEvent()
        Randomly assigns Territories to Players (using up one of their armies to place) until all territories are owned.

      • placeArmyEvent

        public void placeArmyEvent(Player player)
        This event signals a Player to place one army if the Player has at least 1 army to place. The Player needs to be passed in since there is no active Player until the end of the setup phase.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to place an army

      • startGetArmiesEvent

        public void startGetArmiesEvent(GetArmiesView getArmiesView)
        This event signals the GameViewManager that the SetupView will be done soon and it queues up the GetArmiesView that should follow.
        Parameters:
        getArmiesView - The GetArmiesView that should follow the SetupView
